code: import _toConsumableArray from"/Users/mac/Documents/Web/reactjs/myshop/node_modules/@babel/runtime/helpers/esm/toConsumableArray";import _objectSpread from"/Users/mac/Documents/Web/reactjs/myshop/node_modules/@babel/runtime/helpers/esm/objectSpread2";import*as types from"./../constants/ActionType";var initialState={products:[{id:1,src:'https://cdn.tgdd.vn/Products/Images/42/214909/samsung-galaxy-note-10-lite-chi-tiet-1-400x460.png',name:'Samsung Galaxy Note 10 Lite',price:11490000},{id:2,src:'https://clickbuy.com.vn/uploads/2019/03/iPhone-7-jetback.png',name:'Iphone 7 Lock 32Gb cũ',price:3190000},{id:3,src:'https://clickbuy.com.vn/uploads/2019/03/apple-iphone-xr-vang-600x600.png',name:'Iphone XR 64Gb quốc tế cũ',price:10690000},{id:4,src:'https://didongthongminh.vn/upload_images/2019/01/SAMSUNG-GALAXY-S10-WHITE.png',name:'Samsung Galaxy S10',price:8290000},{id:5,src:'https://phuongtung.vn/pt/images/detailed/10/oppo-a1k-400x460.png',name:'Oppo A1K',price:2690000},{id:6,src:'https://cdn.tgdd.vn/Products/Images/42/216172/oppo-reno3-pro-den-400x460-400x460.png',name:'Oppo Reno3 Pro',price:13990000}],cart:[]};var myReducer=function myReducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:initialState;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case types.ADD_CART:return _objectSpread({},state,{cart:[].concat(_toConsumableArray(state.cart),[action.cart])});case types.DELETE_PRODUCT:var list=state.cart.filter(function(item){return item.id!==action.id;});return _objectSpread({},state,{cart:list});default:return state;}};export default myReducer;
